channel.title: Bad Company 2
channel.description:
Didn't see a thread about it, i'm playing the single player at the moment and i have to admit, it's pretty amazing.
Yet to try the multiplayer.

item.title: Bad Company 2
item.dc:creator: Ajax
item.description:
I haven’t gotten it, but I’m a little worried about the statements about a “Much more mature campaign.”

IMO, that was the draw of Bad Company 1. It was absolutely rediculous and over the top in it’s humor. I liked it that way. We have FAR too many war games that take themselves FAR too seriously, we need our gaming Earnest Joins the Army, and BC1 was it.

Read full topic

item.title: Bad Company 2

item.description:
Well Bad Company was my favorite game ever, so I’m sure this is going to be great also.
